name: The Ritual
summary:
Warning: this is not a happy game.

Princess Valerie is being escorted by her knight through the woods and to the site of an ancient ritual that the princess must perform to bring prosperity back to her kingdom.

Follow the two women on their journey, choose what they discuss, and take your time to examine their innermost thoughts.

They only have a more few days together before the ritual.

This is a text game made in Twine for Yuri Jam 2017. It takes around 30 minutes to play through.
